snippet.title: Ballavita (2020) Trailer
snippet.description:
BALLAVITA (2020) 
34 min. cinematic VR experience

Release March 26 2020 on Steam/Viveport/AmazeVR

Who wouldn’t like to live in a dream?
An old man has a peculiar hobby. He collects other peoples dreams to relive them as he pleases. 
He is constantly on the hunt for new dreams. When he eavesdrops on Anton and Maria having an argument, he sees his chance. He lures Maria into the depths of her soul to satisfy his addiction. Will Maria manage to escape or will she remain trapped forever in a desolate world without dreams? 

Ballavita is 34 min., live-action, stereoscopic VR-film embedded in photorealistic CGI. It is a romantic fantasy story and uses camera movements to enhance the experience and further the underlying esthetics.
“Vita” is Italian for life and “ballare” is “to dance”. In Ballavita life is a dance: lush, colorful, everything is in motion. 
The ensemble of dancers was led by an internationally renowned choreographer. Many of the dancers have taken part in competetive ballroom world champion ships and won titles.

 • 75. Venice Filmfestival, nominated for Venice VR competition
 • VR Days Amsterdam, VR Church 
 • Lumiere Awards Brussels, Nominee
 • International Filmfestival Busan, Korea, VR showcase
 • Diagonale Graz, Austria, VR showcase 
 • Mar del Plata, Argentina, VR showcase
